title: CAN WE GET SOME FIORA SKINS, PLEASE??

embed.description: Fiora - the Grand Duelist 6300/ 975 Secondary Bar Mana Release Date 2012-02-29 Last Changed N/A

body:
Hello!

Onto business - I enjoy waiting around for announcements and upcoming content just like any old bloke.
But lately, I feel my foot must be put down.
I feel that justice must be done.
I feel that we have all forgotten about someone very, very dear to my heart...

"Let's check out our OP players of the game...Fiora, Fiora, Fiora, Fiora and Fiora."  - Primetime Draven

{{champion:114}} 

Well, okay. She's not as OP as she used to be. HOWEVER!
That does not mean we should forget about this little lady! After all, she got back your wife's cardigan.
In all seriousness, Fiora is an incredibly fun champion to play. She's fast, flashy, arrogant, and packs a HUGE punch.

HISTORY TIME:
The Grand Duelist was released on February 29th, 2012. Since League's inception, Fiora is generally considered as the first champion designed to be a full-on AD hyper-carry. 
Still used today, although typically overshadowed by champions like {{champion:24}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:92}} , Fiora presses on in her desire to prove that she is tougher than the rest.

And in order to do that, my friends - she needs SKINS!!!
Skins, skins, skins, skins, skins....did I say skins yet?
Fiora hasn't been awarded **ANY** skins since **2012.** And to make matters worse, she's only got three of them.

I understand that there are other champions who have three skins. And I understand that Fiora's claims to fame only play a small part in the grand scheme of the League of Legends. But it's a claim that I'm willing to support, and a claim that I'm more than willing to fight for :-)

Help me, League community! Let's get Fiora some skins!
#skinsforfi-fi

replies.body: Fiora is in the process of a rework (the details of which I'm unsure of). However, that puts her in a similar boat as Taric - she won't be receiving a new skin until her rework is complete.
